name: anti-binary
description:
in front of you stands three selves.
one is male.
one is female.
one is neither.

they are going to ask questions to help you explore gender, identity, and life.
you will answer these questions, not only as yourself, but as each of them.

this is a single-player journalling game.
it is intended for people who want to learn more about binary and non-binary transgender identity.
use what's in this book as a prompt to write your journal and experience gender from a variety of perspectives.

this game was created in 24 hours as part of "hexcode showdown jam", using the 'funky future 8' colour palette.

feel free to redistribute this game for free by any means.
